abstract: Facebook eventually reverts to the “Top Stories” view of its news feed even if “Most Recent” is chosen, but there are ways around this.
snippet: Facebook eventually reverts to the “Top Stories” view of its news feed even if “Most Recent” is chosen, but there are ways around this.
lead_paragraph: Q. When I use Facebook on my computer, I want to see the most current posts in my news feed, and not the “Top Stories,” which always seem to be older. When I change the view to “Most Recent,” it always reverts back to “Top Stories” after a while. Why won’t it stay on “Most Recent”?

headline.main: Looking for the ‘Most Recent’ Facebook Posts
